txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Heavy sword sheaths from the goblins surrounding Oatbarton. You can make the delivery to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton centre.
'I think that these prove the point very well. Thank you.'
'Folks are concerned about the presence of the Big Folk and goblins so near the town. Would you be willing to bring proof that they can be beaten back to us here.'
Mathom Society Task: Heavy Sword Sheaths
The townsfolk in Oatbarton await the delivery of heavy sword sheaths to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town.
Deliver the heavy sword sheaths to Ponto Oats in Oatbarton
You have been tasked with collecting and delivering heavy sword sheaths from the goblins surrounding Oatbarton. You are to deliver the items to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town of Oatbarton.
Wanted: Heavy sword sheaths from the goblins surrounding Oatbarton.
